resources.string: • Make sure that your phone is connected to the OBD adapter via Bluetooth\n
89 bhp requires Bluetooth permission to connect to OBD adapter. Please grant the permission.
89 bhp requires Bluetooth permission to connect to OBD adapter. No location data is collected by the app. Please grant the permission

1. Turn OFF your vehicle's ignition.

2. Connect an ELM327 Bluetooth OBD adapter to your vehicle's OBD port. The adapter can be bought from any online shopping site for as low as 7 USD. If you don't know the location of the port, please perform a Google search using your vehicle's make and model.

3. Turn ON your vehicle's ignition. The engine may or may not be running. While scanning for trouble codes the engine should not be running.

4. Proceed to the next step.
